DOC.brief_summary: Taurolidine alone or in combination with citrate have been proposed for locking the catheter to reduce the number of catheter infections. As there is not enough evidence to give recommendations in this regard, the study tested the hipothesis that taurolidine improves the outcome of long term paretneral nutrition.
DOC.brief_title: Taurolidine Lock in Long Term Parenteral Nutrition
DOC.criteria: home parenteral nutrition for at least months before enrollment presence of central venous cathter home nutrition < 12 months catheter in peripheral vein
